message: Bob, I believe this product presents a fantastic opportunity for you and I'm happy to discuss it further.  To start the conversation, I propose a price of $1,200,000.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1,200,000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. This reflects its value to me while allowing for some room for negotiation.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the value.  However, this product truly is unique and offers substantial long-term benefits that I believe justify a higher price. To move things along, I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,100,000 is still out of my reach.  I'm happy to go up to $900,000 for this product.  It's a significant investment for me, and this is the highest I can go at this time.
